items.content_html: ZenithDB is a lightweight, easy-to-use database for Node.js with support for indexing, aggregation, replication, and concurrency. Its simple API enables you to store and query data quickly and easily, without the need for a complex database management system. Add ZenithDB to your Node.js projects for fast and efficient database functionality.
items.title: harshkumar742/zenith-db: ZenithDB is a lightweight, easy-to-use database for Node.js with support for indexing, aggregation, replication, and concurrency. Its simple API enables you to store and query data quickly and easily, without the need for a complex database management system. Add ZenithDB to your Node.js projects for fast and efficient database functionality.
